column3: Loss is experienced in many ways like divorce, job loss and so on. The extreme case of loss is experienced through the death of a loved one.
column4: Loss is experienced in many ways like divorce, job loss and so on. The extreme case of loss is experienced through the death of a loved one.

column3: Coping with the Loss is a Process. It takes time to work through it. This program measures your ability to cope through the Process.

column3: This ability or Skill is called Adaptation Vector or AV. AV gives you energy to overcome obstacles.

column3: The exercise consists of 50 questions. It takes about 10 minutes to complete. The results follow after the exercise.

column3: You have experienced the loss of a loved one (deceased). Focus on this person. Select either A or B.
